page.title: 01Introducing the area
page.content: This is a{low lying rural area}with farming practicing a mixed{corn and {dairy}economy (plus a few sheep). Winters are sufficiently mild (6c) for grass to continue growing, providing a measure of outdoor grazing.{Settlement is{nucleated}at Podimore and Northover The latter is mostly a naval estate housing personnel from the{Royal Naval {Air Station,H.M.S.Heron,at Yeovilton. Yeovil is the nearest large centre to which people look for shopping, cultural and recreational activities. Within the last decade a{by pass}was built through the N. part of this area to relieve the congestion of summer holiday traffic(following the A303 from London to the S.W.) piling up in long stationary queues at Ilchester. The following pages have been compiled by the pupils of Ilchester Primary School.
